name: Dam, J. [x]. van aan Verwey, Albert | 1884-02-14

Transcription.text:
¶Amst. 14.2.'84

Mr Albert Verwey Esq

My remarks are only those:

    1o The newly constructed Art. 21. (about the treasurer) you write Board of Directors; it must be: Committee of Management.
    2o The explanation according to my proposal about a librairy. Our intention is to state into the rules there must be a librairy, in the positive; a librairy must be ordered by the rules not more but also not less.
    The construction of a [domestiq?] program is of a later question and this can not be inserted into the general rules. but the cardinal point must be stated into this rules - as a seperate committee for this according to my opinion, will led to much quarrelling afterwards.

Thankfully
Yours truly
[J.L.?] van Dam.
